meta.title: Technical Support

hero.title: Technical Support
hero.description: Get the resources and support you need for RPMS

items.question: What equipment can RPMS be used with?
items.answer: RPMS can be applied to most equipment using AC/DC power, including servers, network equipment, and industrial machinery.

items.question: How many devices can be controlled?
items.answer: Up to 32 power modules can be connected to a single controller, and multiple controllers can be managed centrally.

items.question: What happens if internet connection is lost?
items.answer: Schedules configured on the controller continue to operate locally. Data is automatically synchronized when connection is restored.

items.question: Can it integrate with existing systems?
items.answer: With REST API and SNMP support, it can integrate with most monitoring systems.

contact.title: Technical Support Contact
contact.description: Contact our technical support team for additional assistance.
